website_summaries.verdict: If you like the idea of a razor and trimmer in one, this might be the choice for you. Otherwise, the Braun edges out its trimming capabilities.
pros: Shaves and trims, wet or dry
Comes with a trim guard, cleaning brush, and 90-day guarantee
cons: Pulls a bit when trimming, especially in delicate areas
Razor side is not ideal for a smooth shave

customer_reviews.title: this is good. It will not make it perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is the answer to your prayers, ladies coming from Eastern Europe and used to cheap waxing, every 3-4 weeks. Yeah, I'm looking at you, who's skin is crawling just at the thought of sliding a razor on your skin. I know how you feel. But this thing, this is good. It will not make it perfect, but it will be better.
customer_reviews.author: Flavia

customer_reviews.title: Great Shaver
customer_reviews.text: Let's just say I gave birth three months ago and had a difficult recovery with no time or energy to keep up on landscaping. I ordered this because it was portable and wanted something gentle. It did excellently! It does need two AAA batteries so I like that I don't need to plug it in.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent electric shaver! Buy this you will love it!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute best shaver for women/teenagers by far! You don't need to by shaving creams any more & it's nice for once to dry shave! It runs on batteries & it gets all the hair! You can also do your under arms & bikini line with no problem!! No more nicks or cuts just smooth sexy legs!!!!
customer_reviews.author: kim  ford

customer_reviews.title: Not a happy customer
customer_reviews.text: But if it gets wet, doesn't work anymore. Had to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Suetecha

customer_reviews.title: Nice shaver
customer_reviews.text: Good shaver. I like the length of the handle works really well on legs and arms.
customer_reviews.author: LAURI WECH

customer_reviews.title: When people think you only grow little stubble hairs on your legs
customer_reviews.text: When I tried this I thought it will be helpful with getting rid of the long hairs on my leg, but it didn't work as much as I expected it to. It only gotten better when my leg hair was shortened.
customer_reviews.author: Raya

customer_reviews.title: The price was right
customer_reviews.text: Good for legs but not so much for the bikini line
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. mommy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Most shavers don't shave down to the skin like this one does. My legs are silky smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine

customer_reviews.title: Women's Shaver & Bikini Trimmer by LiBa |...
customer_reviews.text: I used it once. It worked very well. I was please by this shaver. Hope it lasts.

customer_reviews.title: Love this razor
customer_reviews.text: Love this razor. Took it with me on a 3week trip and it performed beautifully. Wish it used rechargeable batteries is the only draw back.
customer_reviews.author: Betteena Crawshaw

customer_reviews.title: This product is gentle and great. Doesn't get as close of a shave as ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is gentle and great. Doesn't get as close of a shave as a traditional razor but is great for quick clean ups and for trimming purposes. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Darby Boudreaux

customer_reviews.title: I just got it today and when i opened it ...
customer_reviews.text: I just got it today and when i opened it i realized that the comb that's mentioned to be present in it wasn't there.. yet to use it.. will get back on that.

customer_reviews.title: Defected piece
customer_reviews.text: It was defected piece. By the time I found out, it was out of return period.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Died after 4 months. It lasted longer than most electric shavers.

customer_reviews.title: this was a good buy and it does well on
customer_reviews.text: this was a good buy and it does well on hair

customer_reviews.title: a good product
customer_reviews.text: smooth, easy shave in or out of the shower. nice color. lightweight. easy to clean.

customer_reviews.title: LiBa women's shaver
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my purchase. Very easy to use and to keep clean/maintained.

customer_reviews.title: Shaver itself is very nice - but does not produce as smooth a shave ...
customer_reviews.text: Shaver itself is very nice - but does not produce as smooth a shave as preferred. Had to use a razor to get smoother.

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my daughter because everytime she shaves she ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter because everytime she shaves she gets ravor bumps; she used this on her legs and underarms and didn't get any bumps. She totally loves this trimmer.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shaver
customer_reviews.text: Awesome I finally found a shaver that actually cuts the hair. I would certainly buy again & recommend to anyone it works!!!

customer_reviews.text: Very cheap. Not worth the money. Reviews were great but when my daughter used it it already does not work. It also runs off batteries and the batteries go dead very quick.

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 2 months. I want to return it! 😑

customer_reviews.text: Trimmer blades work well, but the shaving blade is mediocre. Would not recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Broken Foil, Didn't Last 9 Months
customer_reviews.text: My wife was quite pleased with this shaver at first. Normal to light usage and yesterday morning the foil just snapped. No replacements available and didn't keep packaging, so I don't know if there is a warranty. Apparently just a throw-away product.
customer_reviews.author: JClouseau

customer_reviews.title: this was the worst of the bunch
customer_reviews.text: Completely died after about a month of use. I've had several, this was the worst of the bunch.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Would not suggest this product!
customer_reviews.text: This razor was not what I had expected. First of all the on and off switch doesn't work so you have to take the battery in and out every time you use it. Secondly the quality of the razor is cheap, it does not work for close cut shaving and doesn't leave your skin smooth. Ultimetly this was a very useless, disappointing buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It's okay, the comb attachment is too rounded so if your trimming it has a hard time picking up hair. It gets the job done but don't bother if your in a hurry, getting a quick bikini trim is frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eh...the Customer Service was Superb..
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend if you have course/thick hair. It seemed to work well on thin hairs but other than that forget it. Customer service was great so that why there's 3 stars. Not a close shave either. You get what you pay for but I'm sure others have better experiences since everyone is different!
customer_reviews.author: Melia A.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: This thing broke after about two uses. I hadn't had it very long, I don't grow hair very fast, so I don't have to use it often, but when I went to use it a second time, it broke.
customer_reviews.author: Ladyday

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed I probably use this shaver once a month. It literally lasted me a year. Went to use it today and it has stopped working, swapped batteries still not working. Such a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: D0pecOuture

customer_reviews.title: unhappy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these products but found that the mechanism was broken on one and just not working for the other. I am very unhappy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: I want to put zero stars. Omg. I'm so upset I wasted money on this. There's no where to put the batteries without taking it apart? Piece of crap
customer_reviews.author: Robert Parrish

customer_reviews.title: Good but not for long
customer_reviews.text: Worked great at first... then after 3 months using every 2 weeks stopped working all together. Used dry so no water damage is possible. Also bought brand new batteries still no function.
customer_reviews.author: brittney malone

customer_reviews.title: LiBa Women's Bikini Shaver DOA!
customer_reviews.text: Shaver arrived in Amazon package with another shaver (Men's) from Wahl. No packaging damage evident.The Wahl worked out of the box the LiBa was dead. Despite new batteries, that checked OK and installed as directed (+ and -), the shaver would not turn on. Dead as a door nail ! Actually, it's not so much that I hate it. How could I know how well it might have worked or how much I might have loved it if it was DOA?
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Goodetime

customer_reviews.title: So I loved this product
customer_reviews.text: So I loved this product! so much better than shaving, I purchased this in Sep. 2016, and I took it on a flight and when I landed it no longer worked:( How do I get the warranty replacement?? Don't want to buy another one since it was less than 36 months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The product did not work at all. But new batteries in it and it still wouldn't come on
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works fine but won’t last long !
customer_reviews.text: Item was good and functionally initially.But it won’t work after a few minutes of use!i won’t recommend this one!
customer_reviews.author: Neenu

customer_reviews.title: Defected Item!
customer_reviews.text: It came defected. It's missing the metal part on one side for the batteries.

customer_reviews.title: it was dead!! it didnt work!
customer_reviews.text: When I saw it I just love it. I really wanted that product. But when I put the batteries it does not turn it on. Does not work at all. Im very frustrated!! I really wanted it to work for me!
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: I just wasted my money 😢
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this one for my daughter and one for me. I put brand new batteries in and turned them on but they didn’t turn on. So I thought “maybe I put the batteries in wrong” and switched them around. Still didn’t turn on. Then I got another set of brand new batteries... still didn’t turn on. I just wasted my money 😢

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I used it once and now it will not even turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wasted my money

customer_reviews.title: It worked great in the beginning
customer_reviews.text: It worked great in the beginning, but I've had it for less than a week and it has stopped working. Also I ordered the black one and go the blue one. Not reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Charu Mahajan

customer_reviews.title: Won't turn on!
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn't work. I ordered it and it wouldn't even turn on. I tried different new batteries, didn't work. I wrote the company and they sent me another one. The second one didn't work either!! Do not buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jolene Chaffin

customer_reviews.title: but it works better than any razor I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: I have paid almost $ 90 for a Lady Remmington ..never worked. I saw this and thought...okay... it's cheap enough that it won't kill me if it doesn't work, I had some skin cancer and couldn't use regular razor but I have never had hair on my legs ! I thought maybe this will be easier on the areas they'd removed cancer (like a wart) from ... and IT works. NOT only does it work, but it works better than any razor I've ever used. I LOVE THINGS THAT WORK !! I just bought them for my granddaughters and daughters -in -law !!! Came quickly, great packaging. 2 AAA batteries. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: BABIBEEMER

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my old broken philips bikini trimmer with this shaver/trimmer ...
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my old broken philips bikini trimmer with this shaver/trimmer. It gives a much closer shave! It only has one length of trimmer guard, which I used to use to trim hair to a short length before laser hair removal sessions. With this shaver, I just need to make sure to use it two days before I am scheduled for laser. So far I've had no problems using it carefully in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: S. Helfrich

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in a pinch!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little shaver. It gets close enough that it doesn't look like you have any hair on your legs BUT you can still feel light stubble. But it's great for when you need to shave in a pinch to wear shorts or a skirt.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewMama

customer_reviews.title: the top part pops off easily in the shower
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but seems to yank the hair a bit from time to time. After a few months of use, the top part pops off easily in the shower, and I keep having to reattach it. But it works great in the shower and underwater in the tub. Smooth, but not ultra smooth, results.
customer_reviews.author: "aerocat13"

customer_reviews.title: Shaves close enough to make the legs look smoothe, ...
customer_reviews.text: Shaves close enough to make the legs look smoothe, without causing ingrown hairs. Works quickly for an electric razor. Doesn't feel perfectly smoothe to the touch (which is probably why there are no ingrown hairs).
customer_reviews.author: Jewels

customer_reviews.title: Awesome trimmer!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this trimmer! I like to use it in my bikini area and armpits. It doesn't bother me that it's not hairless bc it beats not getting razed burns and ingrown hairs. It gets pretty darn close to being hair free though! It comes w its own cleaning brush and instructions on how to clean the trimmer. It's quite wide so if you plan to use this this on your sensitive bits it may be challenging. Furthermore, it has an nicely curved design that fits well in your hand. I would definitely recommend this trimmer. For the price you can't beat it!
customer_reviews.author: Jbella

customer_reviews.title: Great trimmer /shaver
customer_reviews.text: This product is really good I will recommend this to anybody who's looking for a good shape down there just forewarning you might want to have bikini zone in handy because you might get razor bumps if you are normal to attract them after you get done shaving or trimming like myself other than that I will buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the blades are not super sharp and can't be replaced
customer_reviews.text: I've never gotten razor burn or ingrown hairs using this! However, the blades are not super sharp and can't be replaced. I did break my first one (my fault) and bought a new one right a way. Great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wife and daughter said it was very comfortable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Wife and daughter said it was very comfortable and easy to use. Daughter has just started shaving, and this is perfect for her. Wife told me to get one for her after showing daughter how to use.
customer_reviews.author: Lost

customer_reviews.title: It definitely does a good job, doesn't irritate my skin and gets the ...
customer_reviews.text: It definitely does a good job, doesn't irritate my skin and gets the hair pretty dang short, but it uses triple a batteries and isn't rechargeable so that's a downside for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Just what I had in mind
customer_reviews.text: Not as smooth as shaving, but a very very close trim and doesn't result in quite as much irritation hair growing in after shaving completely smooth.
customer_reviews.author: MireilleTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the cost
customer_reviews.text: This shaver has been kicking for years and have not broken on me! Great for the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Perry . B

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Satisfied with my purchase. It's nice to have something like this to get rid of bikini hair. Although I would suggest trimming your hair a fair amount and then using this to shave, otherwise it will snag hair and be very painful!
customer_reviews.author: V. Frias

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love the shaver and the edgers! Does not pull on the hairs, gets a very nice close shave with one pass. Only disappointed in the fact that it will not run on rechargeable batteries.
customer_reviews.author: A. J. Jones

customer_reviews.title: good trimmer
customer_reviews.text: this works pretty good for some grooming but for a bikini or any bathing suite you would still need a razor this is just a trimmer but im happy with it knowing this
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl M.

customer_reviews.title: Does a nice job on bikini area
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Doesn't pull, cut, nick. Does a nice job on bikini area. I have only used it dry though, so don't know how it works in the shower. Nice warranty too so pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Susan V.

customer_reviews.title: I was very happy with the results I got
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after my other shaver died. I am a review reader and decided to give this a try. I was very happy with the results I got. It took me a few minutes to figure out the best angle for the shave I wanted and after that it was smooth sailing.

customer_reviews.title: ... understand how to use it appropriately but it works great for

product_meta.title: Women’s Shaver & Bikini Trimmer by LiBa | Portable Multi-Blade Body Groomer for Women | for Wet Or Dry Shaving - Clean, Precision Shaving & Trimming – with Cleaning Brush & Trim Guard (Pink)
product_meta.description:
Color:Pink

ATTENTION, LADIES!

Are you tired of spending your hard-earned money on waxing? 

Do you despise wasting precious time struggling with ineffective shavers that not only never seem to do the job, but leave you filled with bumps and burns?

We have the perfect solution for you!

LiBa’s Shaver And Bikini Trimmer Is Your New Favorite Personal Care Gadget

Throw away your disposable razors, you won’t need them anymore. This perfect trimmer and shaver allows convenient hair shaving, removal or shape maintenance.

Featuring long, rounded tips, this trimmer’s head naturally contours to your bikini hairline, helping you attain safe, comfortable shaving or trimming hair to the length you desire.

Exceptionally easy to use, this trimmer and shaver will become your go-to grooming product, instantly replacing all your other shaving devices and the need for professional services, saving you a tremendous amount of money in the long run!

The Perfect Shaving & Trimming Set

Each product comes with a FREE Cleaning Brush and Trim Guard, for quick and convenient maintenance.

Purchase Now The Safest Shaver And Trimmer On The Market!

What are you waiting for, then?

Click Add To Cart Before We Run Out Of Stock!
feature_bullets: COMFORTABLE HAIR REMOVAL & TRIMMING: Stop spending money on torturous hair removal methods! You can now maintain your personal grooming routine without wasting another penny on professional services. LiBa’s shaver and bikini trimmer allows for perfect hair removal and maintenance, in the comfort of your own home!

HYPO-ALLERGENIC BLADES: This trimmer and shaver are safe to use on all skin types, even on those extremely sensitive and tender to shaving. Its blades are 100% hypo-allergenic and are soft to the tender, delicate skin of the bikini region.

AVOID BURNS AND IRRITATION: Featuring an angled head, this body groomer helps you shave or trim hair as close to the skin as possible, without causing razor burns, skin redness and/or irritation. It’s also ideally shaped to reach every skin area without effort and cut or remove wild, coarse hair with ease.

LIGHTWEIGHT & PORTABLE: Powered by 2xAA batteries, this cordless trimmer and shaver is perfect for travel. It is safe to use while in the shower or bathtub, as it is designed for both wet and dry shaving. *Recommended to use alkaline batteries

MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE, FREE CLEANING BRUSH & TRIM GUARD: Your satisfaction is our top priority! Each of our products is backed by a 36-Month-Warranty and 90-Day Money-Back Guarantee! To help you get a smooth trimming and shaving experience, we offer you a FREE Cleaning Brush and Trim Guard with every purchase! Click Buy Now And Get This Multitasking Shaver In Your Life!
